item.description: Django Information Author: Arthur Hui Author: Shardad Shadrou Last Updated: May 2021 Django Information models.py views.py eventCreate() eventView(eventId) submitToken(assignmentId) submitPython(submissionId, assignmentId) assignNew(eventId): urls.py We used Django to handle a lot of the website connection and deploy the html files. It is a high level python web frame work with a lot of utility.
